about_the_game:
"Conjured Through Death" is a dark and gripping top-down roguelike that tells the tragic story of a mage whose reckless experiments with forbidden magic ended in disaster. Once a powerful sorcerer, you are now a living corpse doomed to endless cycles of reincarnation, inhabiting the bodies of the dead. Your lair lies deep within the castle’s dungeons, surrounded by former allies and castle guards who are determined to keep you locked away to prevent your dark magic from escaping.

Your journey begins in the deepest, darkest corners of the castle. Step by step, you fight your way toward freedom, facing increasingly powerful foes—seasoned warriors, cunning mages, and relentless guards willing to give their lives to stop you. Along the way, you discover ancient altars that serve as sources of power. These altars allow you to enhance your weapons, unlock powerful spells, and improve your attributes, offering countless paths to develop your abilities and adapt to the trials ahead.

The game features five powerful weapons and four grimoires, each representing a distinct elemental force. These can be unlocked using the souls of defeated enemies, adding strategic depth and providing even more ways to create a unique playstyle.

Each run tests your skill, strategy, and determination, with relentless battles against unique and unforgiving bosses that demand mastery of your arsenal. As you fight your way out of the castle, a deeper question emerges: are you a hero seeking redemption for the chaos you caused, or a villain intent on spreading your dark power beyond the walls? The answers lie in your victories and the echoes of the lives you take along the way.
